summary: your own little world with house, guards, a giant pet rat, swimming pool and more things to come
descriptionHtml: This mod adds in your own personal realm called paradise. it comes with your own house that has a sleeping area, dinning area, library, massive storage area (4 chests, 5 barrels, 2 bedside tables, 3 wardrobes) and crafting area (forge, workbench, grindstone, cooking pot, alchemy workbench, arcane enchanter) and some weapon racks. You also get your own huge pet rat that sits around right outside your house, a small swimming pool and some guards (orcs in their underwear). i will add more things in the future and it would be helpful if others could suggest what to add next in the forums.
author: fartykis
